Application Logic¶

New Logic can be expressed in terms of an API that applies Core Concepts to Domain objects.

Disagreeing with the Believable View¶

Believable View Disagrees With.

insights.believable_view_disagrees.believable_and_overall_meeting_section_sentiment_disagree_119(question: prios_api.domain_objects.objects.Question) → prios_api.domain_objects.meta.Assertion[source]¶

Believable and Overall Meeting Section Sentiment Disagree

TODO: This function assumes non-zero believabilities for every person

Parameters:objects.Question – The “Rate This Section” question object
Returns:An assertion describing whether substantive disagreement exists between the believable and overall meeting section sentiment
Return type:meta.Assertion

Examples

>>> rate_the_section = objects.Question(title='Rate This Section', question_type=objects.QuestionType.RATING)
>>> adam = objects.Person(name='Adam', believability=0.45)
>>> bob = objects.Person(name='Bob', believability=0.05)
>>> charlie = objects.Person(name='Charlie', believability=0.05)
>>> rate_the_section.responses.append(objects.Response(source=adam, target=rate_the_section, value=10))
>>> rate_the_section.responses.append(objects.Response(source=bob, target=rate_the_section, value=1))
>>> rate_the_section.responses.append(objects.Response(source=charlie, target=rate_the_section, value=5))
>>> result = believable_and_overall_meeting_section_sentiment_disagree_119(rate_the_section)
>>> result.value
1

Uniqueness¶

<<<<<<< HEAD insights.uniqueness.uniquely_out_of_sync_on_question_136(question: src.objects.Question) → List[src.meta.Assertion][source]¶

A person is uniquely ouf of sync on a question, if their response is unique ( analytics.disagreement.unique_choice) and out-of-sync with the believable consensus ( analytics.disagreement.out_of_sync_people_on_question).

Parameters

question –

Returns

Assertion for each person who answers the question. Value is whether they are uniquely out of sync.

Return type

List[meta.Assertion]

======= insights.uniqueness.uniquely_out_of_sync_on_question_136(question: prios_api.domain_objects.objects.Question) → List[prios_api.domain_objects.meta.Assertion][source]¶

A person is uniquely out of sync on a question, if their response is unique ( prios_api.disagreement.is_unique) and out-of-sync with the believable consensus ( prios_api.disagreement.out_of_sync_people_on_question).

Parameters:question –
Returns:Assertion for each person who answers the question. Value is whether they are uniquely out of sync.
Return type:List[meta.Assertion]
